text: RTK 4 (English: Radio Television of Kosovo 4, Albanian: Radio Televizioni i Kosovës 4), is a public TV channel in Pristina, Kosovo. RTK 4 is part of the Radio Television of Kosovo (RTK), a public service broadcaster, along with the other public channels, RTK 1, 2, and 3. == About == After the launch of the second public channel, (RTK 2), in March 2014, RTK 4 was launched, which is an arts and documentaries channel for the Kosovar viewers. RTK 4 was launched along with the third channel, RTK 3, on behalf of the EBU officials. The European Broadcasting Union also helped and funded the launch of the 2 new channels. == References == == External links == Category:2014 establishments in Kosovo Category:Television stations in Kosovo Category:Albanian-language television stations Category:Television channels and stations established in 2014
title: RTK 4
